parameters.name: Noise Level
parameters.description: The mixer level for the noise oscillator.

parameters.name: Amplitude Envelope Attack Time
parameters.description: Attack time for the amplitude envelope.

parameters.name: Amplitude Envelope Decay Time
parameters.description: Decay time for the amplitude envelope.

parameters.name: Amplitude Envelope Sustain Level
parameters.description: Sustain level for the amplitude envelope.

parameters.name: Amplitude Envelope Release Time
parameters.description: Release time for the amplitude envelope.

parameters.name: Filter Cutoff
parameters.description: The cutoff of the lowpass filter

parameters.name: Resonance
parameters.description: This is the resonance for the low pass filter. It should never be to high. Somewhere between 0 and 90 is recommended.

parameters.name: Filter Envelope Amount
parameters.description: Controls the degree to which the low pass filter cutoff frequency is modulated by the filter envelope. 64 is zero amount. <64 gives a negative envelope. >64 gives a positive envelope.

parameters.name: Filter Envelope Attack Time
parameters.description: Attack time for the filter envelope.

parameters.name: Filter Envelope Decay Time
parameters.description: Decay time for the filter envelope.

parameters.name: Filter Envelope Sustain Level
parameters.description: Sustain level for the filter envelope.

parameters.name: Filter Envelope Release Time
parameters.description: Release time for the filter envelope.
